title: Workplace Learning Dimension-Based Practical Mathematics Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced Mathematical Concepts Relevant to Job Roles and Practical Problem-Solving Experience
context.additional_context: Process for current practitioners to design and implement mathematics projects applicable to real work environments, considering workplace learning dimensions (time, space, body, objects)

learning_goals: Learners design projects analyzing workplace scenarios to derive learning requirements across time, space, physical, and object dimensions
Learners apply real-world data collected via smartphone-based tools to mathematical modeling to propose solutions
Learners evaluate the feasibility of peer-feedback-designed projects and derive improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
